2011-02-22

BtVS: The Dark Age / Anthony Head's head

Just to show what a dark past Ripper had he seems to have the head of a young Anthony Head but the body of our most notorious hellraiser, the (forever) young Sid Vicious...

I haven't managed to track down the exact picture uesd (although admittedly I didn't try too hard) but this is close enough I think. Of course the Pistols were a novelty act by the time Sid came on board.
